textBox.richText: Live in Studio A: Freedom and the Tall Cans

Freedom and the Tall Cans - are David Wilcox, Tim Mercer, Jarred Wright, and Freedom Glory: "local mountains kids that got bored".  Show Direct Link Bluegrass that they say draws a large audience from kids and old people, despite the fact that they in no way intended that to be their demographic.  The music kind of speaks for itself, and I can see how little kids would enjoy it.  But these guys were super chill, I'm pretty sure a couple of them were high and apparently they asked if they could drink in the studio at some point, but overall I'd say it helped their music. (Click on photos for larger)   ...more photos Live in Studio A Photos Happy Listening DJ Recalcitrant id/ Ben
